title: Argentine Bonds Rally on IMF Deal Hopes
sub_head: The International Monetary Fund makes a rare statement on the failures of its 2018 bailout of Argentina
body:
Optimism that Argentina will strike a new agreement with the International Monetary Fund has lifted prices of the countryâ€™s government debt by about 10% in December, analysts said.
The strong performance coincides with an unusual admission by the IMF in recent days that the previous lending package it provided to Argentina in 2018 failed to deliver on its aims.
